markdownRemark.excerpt: Enable Redis Authentication Enable redis authentication password. Test authentication password. If it returns , then it is working.
markdownRemark.html:
Enable Redis Authentication

Enable redis authentication password.

redis-cli
CONFIG SET requirepass your_secret_password

Test authentication password.

redis-cli
AUTH your_secret_password

If it returns OK, then it is working.

frontmatter.title: Building a Minecraft Server With State of the Art Technologies
